DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Plan Study Activity Reason Code ISO21090.DSET.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity that is intended to occur at some point in the context of a particular study that represents a characteristic or requirement intended to be applied to a potential study subject to determine whether or not they may participate in a study. NOTE(S): This allows questions defined as agnostic criteria in defined eligibility criterion (that is, they could be used either as inclusion or exclusion criteria) to be referenced in specific study protocols and allows the inclusion/exclusion distinction to be determined for that study specifically. A coded value specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of an activity. EXAMPLE(S): routine requirement, drug reaction, infectious disease reporting requirement, on patient request.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Plan Study Activity Reason Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:To devise, contrive, or form in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
